# HDNode

Scripts for creating BIP32 hierarchical deterministic keys.

* [derive.ts](./derive.ts)
* [fromMasterSeedBuffer.ts](./fromMasterSeedBuffer.ts)
* [fromMasterSeedString.ts](./fromMasterSeedString.ts)
* [fromXPriv.ts](./fromXPriv.ts)
* [fromXPub.ts](./fromXPub.ts)
* [sign.ts](./sign.ts)
* [verify.ts](./verify.ts)
* [wipePrivateData.ts](./wipePrivateData.ts)
